name: Idyll
description:
Explore the machinations of the mind as you explore a beguiling island, deciphering its riddles and battling out adversaries as you slowly unravel the truth that plagues you.

A game created by Team (Cool)^2 in 3 months as a capstone/thesis project. An edutainment game aimed to encourage efficient [touch] typing through proper use of the home keys. Idyll also features a narrative about the stages of grief told through its environmental storytelling.
